>_ I am a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Language Neuromodulation Lab, Department of Neurology, School of Medicine, Johns Hopkins University, Baltimore, USA.

>> Research Interests

  • Computational Linguistics
  • Neurolinguistics
  • Deep Learning
  • Neuroimaging
  • Speech Pathology
  • Speech Production
